[OZC]Ghost in the Shell Stand Alone Complex Complete Series Blu-Ray Batch + Bonus 


This release contains the complete Ghost in the Shell Stand Alone Complex series, as well as bonus material. There are a small number of changes from released episodes.

Changes include:

-Episodes 1-4 have had their AC3 audio replaced with AAC audio. This brings these episodes in line with the rest of the series.
-Episode 1 has had the previously missing font attached.
-Episodes 1-3 have had the OP karaoke slightly re-timed.

All altered episodes are marked as [v2].

Bonus materials include:

-Clean OP Collection:
-Regular Version
-Alternate Broadcast Version
-Alternate Episode 1 Version
-"Temperate" Version
-Stand Alone Complex OST
-GET9 Single Album
-Official Log 1 Artbook

There will be no support for the single episode torrents as of this release. Any seed requests for those episodes should instead be directed to this torrent. If you are currently downloading any of the single torrents, stop them and arrange your files in the same structure as this torrent, then force a recheck.

Ghost in the Shell Stand Alone Complex Complete Series
Video: MPEG4(h264) 1920x1080 Blu-ray
Audio 1: English Dolby Digital 5.1ch AAC (Default)
Audio 2: Japanese Dolby Digital 5.1ch AAC
Sub 1: English Lyrics/Titles (Default)
Sub 2: English Subs

Video and English Audio and is taken from Japanese Blu-Ray release. English Subs taken from R1 DVD.
